languages.text: "Недавно я начала внедрять целый ряд улучшений, которые поднимут производительность планеты и при этом сократят побочные эффекты от обработки почвы. Представьте себе, как скудоумцы реагируют на исчезновение традиций и процедур, остававшихся незыблемыми на протяжении поколений... каждое изменение встречают в штыки. Боюсь, кто-то воспользовался недальновидностью черни, чтобы нанести удар дому Вьятт".

traits.locale_text: "Я начала внедрять целый ряд улучшений, которые поднимут производительность планеты и при этом сократят побочные эффекты от обработки почвы. Каждое изменение обыватели встречают в штыки... боюсь, кто-то воспользовался их недальновидностью, чтобы нанести удар дому Вьятт".

languages.text: "I recently began introducing a series of improvements to raise the planet's production output, and thereby reduce the side effects of soil cultivation. Imagine how the backward peasants react when their traditions and methods, unchanged over generations, suddenly disappear... Every change is greeted with pitchforks. I fear that someone is exploiting the rabble's short-sightedness as a means of striking at House Vyatt."
languages.original_text: "Недавно я начала внедрять целый ряд улучшений, которые поднимут производительность планеты и при этом сократят побочные эффекты от обработки почвы. Представьте себе, как скудоумцы реагируют на исчезновение традиций и процедур, остававшихся незыблемыми на протяжении поколений... каждое изменение встречают в штыки. Боюсь, кто-то воспользовался недальновидностью черни, чтобы нанести удар дому Вьятт".

traits.locale_text: "I recently began introducing a series of improvements to raise the planet's production output, and thereby reduce the side effects of soil cultivation. Imagine how the backward peasants react when their traditions and methods, unchanged over generations, suddenly disappear... Every change is greeted with pitchforks. I fear that someone is exploiting the rabble's short-sightedness as a means of striking at House Vyatt."

"I recently began introducing a series of improvements to raise the planet's production output, and thereby reduce the side effects of soil cultivation. Imagine how the backward peasants react when their traditions and methods, unchanged over generations, suddenly disappear... Every change is greeted with pitchforks. I fear that someone is exploiting the rabble's short-sightedness as a means of striking at House Vyatt."

"I recently began introducing a series of improvements to raise the planet's production output, and thereby reduce the side effects of soil cultivation. Imagine how the backward peasants react when their traditions and methods, unchanged over generations, suddenly disappear... Every change is greeted with pitchforks. I fear that someone is exploiting the rabble's short-sightedness as a means of striking at House Vyatt."

"I recently began introducing a series of improvements to raise the planet's production output, and thereby reduce the side effects of soil cultivation. Imagine how the backward peasants react when their traditions and methods, unchanged over generations, suddenly disappear... Every change is greeted with pitchforks. I fear that someone is exploiting the rabble's short-sightedness as a means of striking at House Vyatt."

languages.text: “我不久前开始引进一系列改进措施，提高这颗行星的粮食产量，降低土壤耕作带来的副作用。想象一下，对那些落后的农奴而言，如果他们世世代代的传统耕种方式突然消失，他们会作何反应？……他们恐怕只会举起草叉，以此应对每个变化。我怀疑有人在利用那些乌合之众的短视，以此打击维亚特家族。”
languages.original_text: "I recently began introducing a series of improvements to raise the planet's production output, and thereby reduce the side effects of soil cultivation. Imagine how the backward peasants react when their traditions and methods, unchanged over generations, suddenly disappear... Every change is greeted with pitchforks. I fear that someone is exploiting the rabble's short-sightedness as a means of striking at House Vyatt."

traits.locale_text: “我不久前开始引进一系列改进措施，提高这颗行星的粮食产量，降低土壤耕作带来的副作用。想象一下，对那些落后的农民而言，如果他们世世代代的传统耕种方式突然消失，他们会作何反应？……他们恐怕只会举起草叉，以此应对每个变化。我怀疑有人在利用那些乌合之众的短视，以此打击维亚特家族。”

languages.text: «Hace poco empecé a introducir una serie de mejoras para aumentar la producción del planeta y reducir así los efectos del cultivo sobre el suelo. Ya se imaginará cómo reaccionan unos campesinos retrógrados cuando sus tradiciones y métodos desaparecen de la noche a la mañana después de pasar siglos estancados... Reciben cada cambio con horcas y antorchas. Me temo que alguien esté explotando la falta de visión de la plebe para atacar a la casa Vyatt».
languages.original_text: "I recently began introducing a series of improvements to raise the planet's production output, and thereby reduce the side effects of soil cultivation. Imagine how the backward peasants react when their traditions and methods, unchanged over generations, suddenly disappear... Every change is greeted with pitchforks. I fear that someone is exploiting the rabble's short-sightedness as a means of striking at House Vyatt."

traits.locale_text: «Hace poco empecé a introducir una serie de mejoras para aumentar la producción del planeta y reducir así los efectos del cultivo sobre el suelo. Ya se imaginará cómo reaccionan unos campesinos retrógrados cuando sus tradiciones y métodos desaparecen de la noche a la mañana después de pasar siglos estancados... Reciben cada cambio con horcas y antorchas. Me temo que alguien esté explotando la falta de visión de la plebe para atacar a la casa Vyatt».

languages.text: 「最近、この惑星の生産高を向上させるための改良を次々に導入し始めました。その結果、土壌の耕作に伴う副作用が減少します。想像してみてください、進歩のない農民どもが何世代経とうと変えなかった伝統ややり方が、突然消えたらどんな反応をするか…あらゆる変化が農民の怒りに触れます。この反乱の近視眼的な性質を、何者かがビャット家を倒すという目的に利用しているのではないかと心配でなりません」
languages.original_text: "I recently began introducing a series of improvements to raise the planet's production output, and thereby reduce the side effects of soil cultivation. Imagine how the backward peasants react when their traditions and methods, unchanged over generations, suddenly disappear... Every change is greeted with pitchforks. I fear that someone is exploiting the rabble's short-sightedness as a means of striking at House Vyatt."

traits.locale_text: 「最近、この惑星の生産高を向上させるための改良を次々に導入し始めました。その結果、土壌の耕作に伴う副作用が減少します。想像してみてください、進歩のない農民どもが何世代経とうと変えなかった伝統ややり方が、突然消えたらどんな反応をするか…あらゆる変化が農民の怒りに触れます。この反乱の近視眼的な性質を、何者かがビャット家を倒すという目的に利用しているのではないかと心配でなりません」

languages.text: "Ich habe kürzlich damit begonnen, einige Verbesserungen einzuführen, um die Produktion des Planeten zu steigern und zudem die Nebeneffekte der Bodenkultivierung zu reduzieren. Stellt Euch vor, wie rückständige Bauern reagieren, wenn ihre seit Generationen unveränderten Traditionen und Methoden plötzlich verschwinden ... Auf jede Veränderung wird mit Mistgabeln reagiert. Ich fürchte, jemand nutzt die Kurzsichtigkeit des Pöbels aus, um einen Schlag gegen das Haus Vyatt zu führen."
languages.original_text: "I recently began introducing a series of improvements to raise the planet's production output, and thereby reduce the side effects of soil cultivation. Imagine how the backward peasants react when their traditions and methods, unchanged over generations, suddenly disappear... Every change is greeted with pitchforks. I fear that someone is exploiting the rabble's short-sightedness as a means of striking at House Vyatt."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe kürzlich damit begonnen, einige Verbesserungen einzuführen, um die Produktion des Planeten zu steigern und zudem die Nebeneffekte der Bodenkultivierung zu reduzieren. Stellt Euch vor, wie rückständige Bauern reagieren, wenn ihre seit Generationen unveränderten Traditionen und Methoden plötzlich verschwinden ... Auf jede Veränderung wird mit Mistgabeln reagiert. Ich fürchte, jemand nutzt die Kurzsichtigkeit des Pöbels aus, um einen Schlag gegen das Haus Vyatt zu führen."

languages.text: « J'ai récemment commencé à mettre en place une série de mesures visant à augmenter le rendement de la planète, tout en réduisant les effets néfastes de la culture du sol. Imaginez la réaction de paysans arriérés lorsqu'ils voient leurs traditions et leurs méthodes, inchangées depuis des générations, disparaître du jour au lendemain... Ils accueillent le moindre changement la fourche à la main. J'ai bien peur que quelqu'un exploite l'ignorance de la populace dans le but de nuire à la maison Vyatt. »
languages.original_text: "I recently began introducing a series of improvements to raise the planet's production output, and thereby reduce the side effects of soil cultivation. Imagine how the backward peasants react when their traditions and methods, unchanged over generations, suddenly disappear... Every change is greeted with pitchforks. I fear that someone is exploiting the rabble's short-sightedness as a means of striking at House Vyatt."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai récemment commencé à mettre en place une série de mesures visant à augmenter le rendement de la planète, tout en réduisant les effets néfastes de la culture du sol. Imaginez la réaction de paysans arriérés lorsqu'ils voient leurs traditions et leurs méthodes, inchangées depuis des générations, disparaître du jour au lendemain... Ils accueillent le moindre changement la fourche à la main. J'ai bien peur que quelqu'un exploite l'ignorance de la populace dans le but de nuire à la maison Vyatt. »

languages.text: "Kısa süre önce gezegendeki rekolteyi artırmak ve buna müteakip toprağı işlemenin yan etkilerini azaltmak için bir dizi ıslahat başlattım. Geri kafalı köylülerin, nesillerdir değişmeyen gelenekleri ve yöntemleri bir gecede ortadan kalktığında nasıl tepki verdiklerini hayal edin. Her değişime kazan kaldırıyorlar. Birisinin ayaktakımının dar görüşlülüğünden istifade edip Vyatt Hanesi'ne saldırdığından korkuyorum."
languages.original_text: "I recently began introducing a series of improvements to raise the planet's production output, and thereby reduce the side effects of soil cultivation. Imagine how the backward peasants react when their traditions and methods, unchanged over generations, suddenly disappear... Every change is greeted with pitchforks. I fear that someone is exploiting the rabble's short-sightedness as a means of striking at House Vyatt."

traits.locale_text: "Kısa süre önce gezegendeki üretim çıktısını artırmak ve buna müteakip toprak işlemenin yan etkilerini azaltmak için bir dizi ıslahat başlattım. Yobaz köylülerin, nesillerdir değişmeyen gelenekleri ve yöntemleri bir gecede ortadan kalktığında nasıl tepki verdiklerini hayal edin... Her değişime kazan kaldırıyorlar. Korkarım birisi, ayaktakımının dar görüşlülüğünü kullanarak Vyatt Hanesi'ne saldırıyor."
